GK19ragh1-6u:3: kva sūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:8: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇe sūtrasyevāsti me gatiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.4 //
GK19ragh1-6u:20: hemnaḥ saṃlakṣyate hyagnau viśuddhiḥ śyāmikāpi vā // Ragh(K)_1.10 //
GK19ragh1-6u:26: ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣātro dharma ivāśritaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.13 //
GK19ragh1-6u:38: śāstre ca vyāpṛtā buddhirmaurvī dhanuṣi cātatā // Ragh(K)_1.19 //
GK19ragh1-6u:40: phalānumeyāḥ prārambhāḥ saṃskārāḥ prāktanā iva // Ragh(K)_1.20 //
GK19ragh1-6u:43: jñāne maunaṃ kṣamā śaktau tyāge ślāghāviparyayaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:48: sa pitā pitarastāsāṃ kevalaṃ janmahetavaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:50: apyarthakāmau tasyāstāṃ dharma eva manīṣiṇaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.25 //
GK19ragh1-6u:51: dudoha gāṃ sa yajñāya sasyāya maghavā divam /
GK19ragh1-6u:54: vyāvṛttā yatparasvebhyaḥ śrutau taskaratā sthitā // Ragh(K)_1.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:58: tathā hi sarve tasyāsanparārthaikaphalā guṇāḥ // Ragh(K)_1.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:64: tayā mene manasvinyā lakṣmyā ca vasudhādhipaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.32 //
GK19ragh1-6u:66: vilambitaphalaiḥ kālaṃ sa nināya manorathaiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.33 //
GK19ragh1-6u:68: īpsatā santatiṃ nyastā tena mantriṣu kosalā // Ragh(K)_1.34 //
GK19ragh1-6u:84: ṣaḍjasaṃvādinīḥ kekā dvidhā bhinnāḥ śikhaṇḍibhiḥ // Ragh(K)_1.42 //
GK19ragh1-6u:94: api laṅghitamadhvānaṃ bubudhe na budhopamaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.47 //
GK19ragh1-6u:113: tayorjagṛhatuḥ pādau rājā rājñī ca māgadhī /
GK19ragh1-6u:114: tau gururgurupatnī ca prītyā pratinanandatuḥ // Ragh(K)_1.57 //
GK19ragh1-6u:116: papraccha kuśalaṃ rājye rājyāśramamuniṃ muniḥ // Ragh(K)_1.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:119: upapannaṃ nanu śivaṃ saptasvaṅgeṣu yasya me /
GK19ragh1-6u:120: daivīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca pratikartā tvamāpadām // Ragh(K)_1.60 //
GK19ragh1-6u:122: pratyādiśyanta iva me dṛṣṭalakṣyabhidaḥ śarāḥ // Ragh(K)_1.61 //
GK19ragh1-6u:128: sānubandhāḥ kathaṃ na syuḥ sampado me nirāpadaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.64 //
GK19ragh1-6u:130: na māmavati sadvīpā ratnasūrapi medinī // Ragh(K)_1.65 //
GK19ragh1-6u:136: santatiḥ śuddhavaṃśyā tu paratreha ca śarmaṇe // Ragh(K)_1.68 //
GK19ragh1-6u:137: tayā hīnaṃ vinetā māṃ kathaṃ paśyanna dūyate /
GK19ragh1-6u:142: ikṣvākūṇāṃ durāpe 'rthe tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // Ragh(K)_1.71 //
GK19ragh1-6u:152: matprasūtimanārādhya prajeti tvā śaśāpa sā // Ragh(K)_1.76 //
GK19ragh1-6u:153: sa śāpo na tvayā rājanna ca sārathinā śrutaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:160: ārādhaya sapatnīkaḥ sā vāṃ kāmaṃ pradāsyati // Ragh(K)_1.80 //
GK19ragh1-6u:162: anindyā nandinī nāma dhenurāvavṛte vanāt // Ragh(K)_1.81 //
GK19ragh1-6u:172: upasthiteyaṃ kalyāṇī nāmni kīrtita eva yat // Ragh(K)_1.86 //
GK19ragh1-6u:180: avighnamastu te stheyāḥ piteva dhuri putriṇām // Ragh(K)_1.90 //
GK19ragh1-6u:183: atha pradoṣe doṣajñaḥ saṃveśāya viśāṃ patim /
GK19ragh1-6u:188: tacchiṣyādhyayananiveditāvasānāṃ saṃviṣṭaḥ kuśaśayane niśāṃ nināya // Ragh(K)_1.94 //
GK19ragh1-6u:194: nivartya rājā dayitāṃ dayālustāṃ saurabheyīṃ surabhiryaśobhiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:197: na cānyatastasya śarīrarakṣā svavīryaguptā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ // Ragh(K)_2.4 //
GK19ragh1-6u:201: jalābhilāṣī jalamādadānāṃ chāyeva tāṃ bhūpatiranvagacchat // Ragh(K)_2.6 //
GK19ragh1-6u:213: śuśrāva kuñjeṣu yaśaḥ svamuccairudgīyamānaṃ vanadevatābhiḥ // Ragh(K)_2.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:217: ūnaṃ na sattveṣvadhiko babādhe tasminvanaṃ goptari gāhamāne // Ragh(K)_2.14 //
GK19ragh1-6u:218: sañcārapūtāni digantarāṇi kṛtvā dinānte nilayāya gantum /
GK19ragh1-6u:219: pracakrame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ // Ragh(K)_2.15 //
GK19ragh1-6u:221: babhūva sā tena satāṃ matena śraddheva sākṣādvidhinopapannā // Ragh(K)_2.16 //
GK19ragh1-6u:223: yayau mṛgādhyāsitaśādvalāni śyāmāyamānāni vanāni paśyan // Ragh(K)_2.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:229: tadantare sā virarāja dhenurdinakṣapāmadhyagateva sandhyā // Ragh(K)_2.20 //
GK19ragh1-6u:231: praṇamya cānarca viśālamasyāḥ śṛṅgāntaraṃ dvāramivātmasiddheḥ // Ragh(K)_2.21 //
GK19ragh1-6u:233: bhaktyopapanneṣu hi tadvidhānāṃ prasādacihnāni puraḥphalāni // Ragh(K)_2.22 //
GK19ragh1-6u:234: guroḥ sadārasya nipīḍya pādau samāpya sāndhyaṃ ca vidhiṃ dilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:235: dohāvasāne punareva dogdhrīṃ bheje bhujotsannaripurniṣaṇṇām // Ragh(K)_2.23 //
GK19ragh1-6u:237: krameṇa suptāmanu saṃviveśa suptotthitāṃ prātaranūdatiṣṭhat // Ragh(K)_2.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:238: itthaṃ vrataṃ pālayataḥ prajārthaṃ samaṃ mahiṣyā mahanīyakīrteḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:243: alakṣitābhyutpatano nṛpeṇa prasahya siṃhaḥ kila tāṃ cakarṣa // Ragh(K)_2.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:245: raśmiṣvivādāya nagendradattāṃ nivartayāmāsa nṛpasya dṛṣṭim // Ragh(K)_2.28 //
GK19ragh1-6u:246: sa pāṭalāyāṃ gavi tasthivāṃsaṃ dhanurdharaḥ kesariṇaṃ dadarśa /
GK19ragh1-6u:247: adhityakāyāmiva dhātumayyāṃ rodhradrumaṃ sānumataḥ praphultam // Ragh(K)_2.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:248: tato mṛgendrasya mṛgendragāmī vadhāya vadhyasya śaraṃ śaraṇyaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:251: saktāṅguliḥ sāyakapuṅkha eva citrārpitārambha ivāvatasthe // Ragh(K)_2.31 //
GK19ragh1-6u:256: alaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktamapyastramito vṛthā syāt /
GK19ragh1-6u:257: na pādaponmūlanaśakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya // Ragh(K)_2.34 //
GK19ragh1-6u:259: avaihi māṃ kiṅkaramaṣṭamūrteḥ kumbhodaraṃ nāma nikumbhamitram // Ragh(K)_2.35 //
GK19ragh1-6u:260: amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajena /
GK19ragh1-6u:261: yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ // Ragh(K)_2.36 //
GK19ragh1-6u:267: upasthitā śoṇitapāraṇā me suradviṣaścāndramasī sudheva // Ragh(K)_2.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:268: sa tvaṃ nivartasva vihāya lajjāṃ gurorbhavāndarśitaśiṣyabhaktiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:269: śastreṇa rakṣyaṃ yadaśakyarakṣaṃ na tadyaśaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ kṣiṇoti // Ragh(K)_2.40 //
GK19ragh1-6u:270: iti pragalbhaṃ puruṣādhirājo mṛgādhirājasya vaco niśamya /
GK19ragh1-6u:274: saṃruddhaceṣṭasya mṛgendra kāmaṃ hāsyaṃ vacastadyadahaṃ vivakṣuḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:275: antargataṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ tu veda sarvaṃ bhavānbhāvamato 'bhidhāsye // Ragh(K)_2.43 //
GK19ragh1-6u:278: sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ prasīda /
GK19ragh1-6u:281: bhūyaḥ sa bhūteśvarapārśvavartī kiñcidvihasyārthapatiṃ babhāṣe // Ragh(K)_2.46 //
GK19ragh1-6u:282: ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ kāntamidaṃ vapuśca /
GK19ragh1-6u:283: alpasya hetorbahu hātumicchan vicāramugdhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam // Ragh(K)_2.47 //
GK19ragh1-6u:284: bhūtānukampā tava cediyaṃ gaurekā bhavetsvastimatī tvadante /
GK19ragh1-6u:285: jīvanpunaḥ śaśvadupaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha piteva pāsi // Ragh(K)_2.48 //
GK19ragh1-6u:287: śakyo 'sya manyurbhavatā vinetuṃ gāḥ koṭiśaḥ sparśayatā ghaṭodhnīḥ // Ragh(K)_2.49 //
GK19ragh1-6u:292: tathā samarthāṃ giramūcivāṃsaṃ pratyāha devānucaraṃ dilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:293: dhenvā tadadhyāsanakātarākṣyā nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sutarāṃ dayāluḥ // Ragh(K)_2.52 //
GK19ragh1-6u:294: kṣatātkila trāyata ityudagraḥ kṣattrasya śabdo bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:297: imāmanūnāṃ surabheravaihi rudraujasā tu prahṛtaṃ tvayāsyām // Ragh(K)_2.54 //
GK19ragh1-6u:298: seyaṃ svadehārpaṇaniṣkrayeṇa nyāyyaṃ mayā mocayituṃ bhavattaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:299: na pāraṇā syādvihatā tavaivaṃ bhavedaluptaśca muneḥ kriyārthaḥ // Ragh(K)_2.55 //
GK19ragh1-6u:301: sthātuṃ niyokturyadi śakyamagre vināśya rakṣyaṃ svayamakṣatena // Ragh(K)_2.56 //
GK19ragh1-6u:302: kimapyahiṃsyastava cenmato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:303: ekāntavidhvaṃsiṣu madvidhānāṃ piṇḍeṣvanāsthā khalu bhautikeṣu // Ragh(K)_2.57 //
GK19ragh1-6u:305: tadbhūtanāthānuga nārhasi tvaṃ sambandhino me praṇayaṃ vihantum // Ragh(K)_2.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:311: dadarśa rājā jananīmiva svāṃ gāmagrataḥ prasraviṇīṃ na siṃham // Ragh(K)_2.61 //
GK19ragh1-6u:312: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenuruvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /
GK19ragh1-6u:313: ṛṣiprabhāvānmayi nāntako 'pi prabhuḥ prahartuṃ kimutānyahiṃsrāḥ // Ragh(K)_2.62 //
GK19ragh1-6u:314: bhaktyā gurau mayyanukampayā ca prītāsmi te putra varaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
GK19ragh1-6u:315: na kevalānāṃ payasāṃ prasūtimavaihi māṃ kāmadughāṃ prasannām // Ragh(K)_2.63 //
GK19ragh1-6u:316: tataḥ samānīya sa mānitārthī hastau svahastārjitavīraśabdaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:317: vaṃśasya kartāramanantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh(K)_2.64 //
GK19ragh1-6u:318: santānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:319: dugdhvā payaḥ pattrapuṭe madīyaṃ putropayuṅkṣveti tamādideśa // Ragh(K)_2.65 //
GK19ragh1-6u:321: ūdhasyamicchāmi tavopabhoktuṃ ṣaṣṭhāṃśamurvyā iva rakṣitāyāḥ // Ragh(K)_2.66 //
GK19ragh1-6u:324: tasyāḥ prasannendumukhaḥ prasādaṃ gururnṛpāṇāṃ gurave nivedya /
GK19ragh1-6u:325: mukhaprasādānumitaṃ priyāyai śaśaṃsa vācā punaruktayaiva // Ragh(K)_2.68 //
GK19ragh1-6u:327: papau vasiṣṭhena kṛtābhyanujñaḥ śuddhaṃ yaśo bhūya ivāvitṛptaḥ // Ragh(K)_2.69 //
GK19ragh1-6u:329: tau dampatī svāṃ prati rājadhānīṃ prasthāpayāmāsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ // Ragh(K)_2.70 //
GK19ragh1-6u:331: dhenuṃ savatsāṃ ca nṛpaḥ pratasthe sanmaṅgalodagratarānubhāvaḥ // Ragh(K)_2.71 //
GK19ragh1-6u:333: yayāvanudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh(K)_2.72 //
GK19ragh1-6u:337: bhuje bhujaṅgendrasamānasāre bhūyaḥ sa bhūmerdhuramāsasañja // Ragh(K)_2.74 //
GK19ragh1-6u:338: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotiratreriva dyauḥ surasaridiva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtamaiśam /
GK19ragh1-6u:339: narapatikulabhūtyai garbhamādhatta rājñī gurubhirabhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ // Ragh(K)_2.75 //
GK19ragh1-6u:342: nidānamikṣvākukulasya santateḥ sudakṣiṇā dauhadalakṣaṇaṃ dadhau // Ragh(K)_3.1 //
GK19ragh1-6u:344: sthitālpatārāṃ karuṇendumaṇḍalāṃ vibhātakalpāṃ rajanīṃ vyaḍambayat // Ragh(K)_3.2 //
GK19ragh1-6u:345: tadānanaṃ sevitamṛttikālavaṃ nṛpaḥ samāghrāya na tṛptimāyayau /
GK19ragh1-6u:346: karīva siktaṃ pṛṣataiḥ payomucāṃ śucivyapāye vanarājipalvalam // Ragh(K)_3.3 //
GK19ragh1-6u:347: divaṃ marutvāniva bhokṣyate mahīṃ digantaviśrāntaratho hi matsutaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:348: ato 'bhilāṣe prathamaṃ tathāvidhe mano babandhānyarasānvilaṅghya sā // Ragh(K)_3.4 //
GK19ragh1-6u:349: na me hriyā śaṃsati kiñcidīpsitaṃ spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī /
GK19ragh1-6u:351: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yadeva vavre tadapaśyadāhṛtam /
GK19ragh1-6u:355: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāmupoḍhagātropacayā rarāja sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:358: nadīmivāntaḥsalilāṃ sarasvatīṃ nṛpaḥ sagarbhāṃ mahiṣīmamanyata // Ragh(K)_3.9 //
GK19ragh1-6u:360: yathākramaṃ puṃsavanādikāḥ kriyā dhṛteśca dhīraḥ sadṛśīrvyadhatta saḥ // Ragh(K)_3.10 //
GK19ragh1-6u:364: niratyayāya prasavāya tasthuṣī babhau samāsannaphalā kriyeva sā // Ragh(K)_3.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:366: asūta putraṃ samaye śacīsamā trisādhanā śaktirivārthamakṣatam // Ragh(K)_3.13 //
GK19ragh1-6u:368: babhūva sarvaṃ śubhaśaṃsi tatkṣaṇaṃ bhavo hi lokābhyudayāya tādṛśām // Ragh(K)_3.14 //
GK19ragh1-6u:369: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanastasya nijena tejasā /
GK19ragh1-6u:370: niśīthadīpāḥ sahasā hatatviṣo babhūvurālekhyasamarpitā iva // Ragh(K)_3.15 //
GK19ragh1-6u:372: adeyamāsīttrayameva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chattramubhe ca cāmare // Ragh(K)_3.16 //
GK19ragh1-6u:373: sa vīkṣya putrasya cirātpitā mukhaṃ nidhānakumbhasya yuveva durgataḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:374: mudā śarīre prababhūva nātmanaḥ payodhirindūdayamūrchito yathā // Ragh(K)_3.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:375: sa jātakarmaṇyakhile tapasvinā tapovanādetya purodhasā kṛte /
GK19ragh1-6u:378: na kevalaṃ sadmani māgadhīpateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasāmapi // Ragh(K)_3.19 //
GK19ragh1-6u:380: ṛṇābhidhānātsvayameva kevalaṃ tadā pitṚṇāṃ mumuce sa bandhanāt // Ragh(K)_3.20 //
GK19ragh1-6u:381: śrutasya yāyādayamantamarbhakastathā pareṣāṃ yudhi ceti pārthivaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:383: pituḥ prayatnātsa samagrasampadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīrāvayavairdine dine /
GK19ragh1-6u:385: umāvṛṣāṅkau śarajanmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacīpurandarau /
GK19ragh1-6u:386: tathā nṛpaḥ sā ca sutena māgadhī nanandatustatsadṛśena tatsamau // Ragh(K)_3.23 //
GK19ragh1-6u:387: rathāṅganāmnoriva bhāvabandhanaṃ babhūva yatprema parasparaṃ prati /
GK19ragh1-6u:388: vibhaktamapyekasute na tattayoḥ parasparasyopari paryahīyata // Ragh(K)_3.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:389: yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgulim /
GK19ragh1-6u:390: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna so 'rbhakaḥ // Ragh(K)_3.25 //
GK19ragh1-6u:394: svamūrtibhedena guṇāgryavṛttinā patiḥ prajānāmiva sargamātmanaḥ // Ragh(K)_3.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:398: avandhyayatnāśca babhūvuratra te kriyā hi vastūpahitā prasīdati // Ragh(K)_3.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:401: tvacaṃ sa medhyāṃ paridhāya rauravīmaśikṣatāstraṃ pitureva mantravat /
GK19ragh1-6u:402: prayogasaṃhārarahasyavittamo babhūva cāstreṣu yathā purandaraḥ // Ragh(K)_3.31//
GK19ragh1-6u:403: mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśanniva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayanniva /
GK19ragh1-6u:404: raghuḥ kramādyauvanabhinnaśaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gambhīramanoharaṃ vapuḥ // Ragh(K)_3.32 //
GK19ragh1-6u:406: narendrakanyāstamavāpya satpatiṃ tamopahaṃ dakṣasutā ivābabhuḥ // Ragh(K)_3.33 //
GK19ragh1-6u:409: atha prajānāṃ ciramātmanā dhṛtāṃ nitāntagurvīṃ laghayiṣyatā dhuram /
GK19ragh1-6u:410: vaśīti matvā maticakṣuṣā suto nṛpeṇa cakre yuvarājaśabdabhāk // Ragh(K)_3.35 //
GK19ragh1-6u:414: babhūva tenātitarāṃ durutsahaḥ kaṭaprabhedena karīva pārthivaḥ // Ragh(K)_3.37 //
GK19ragh1-6u:416: apūrṇamekena śatakratūpamaḥ śataṃ kratūnāmapavighnamāpa saḥ // Ragh(K)_3.38 //
GK19ragh1-6u:417: ataḥ paraṃ tena makhāya yajvanā turaṅgamutsṛṣṭamanargalaṃ punaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:418: dhanurbhṛtāmagrata eva rakṣiṇāṃ jahāra śakraḥ kila gūḍhavigrahaḥ // Ragh(K)_3.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:419: viṣādaluptapratipatti vismitaṃ kumārasainyaṃ sapadi sthitaṃ ca tat /
GK19ragh1-6u:420: vasiṣṭhadhenuśca yadṛcchayāgatā śrutaprabhāvā dadṛśe 'tha nandinī // Ragh(K)_3.40 //
GK19ragh1-6u:421: tadaṅganiḥṣyandalavena locane pramṛjya puṇyena puraskṛtaḥ satām /
GK19ragh1-6u:423: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ dadarśa devaṃ naradevasambhavaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:424: punaḥ punaḥ sūtaniṣiddhacāpalaṃ harantamaśvaṃ ratharaśmisaṃyutam // Ragh(K)_3.42 //
GK19ragh1-6u:426: avocadenaṃ gaganaspṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayanniva // Ragh(K)_3.43 //
GK19ragh1-6u:427: makhāṃśabhājāṃ prathamo manīṣibhistvameva devendra yadā nigadyase /
GK19ragh1-6u:428: ajasradīkṣāprayatasya madguroḥ kriyāvighātāya kathaṃ pravartase // Ragh(K)_3.44 //
GK19ragh1-6u:429: trilokanāthena satā makhadviṣastvayā niyāmyā nanu divyacakṣuṣā /
GK19ragh1-6u:430: sa cetsvayaṃ karmasu dharmacāriṇāṃ tvamantarāyībhavasi cyuto vidhiḥ // Ragh(K)_3.45 //
GK19ragh1-6u:432: pathaḥ śucerdarśayitāra īśvarā malīmasāmādadate na paddhatim // Ragh(K)_3.46 //
GK19ragh1-6u:433: iti pragalbhaṃ raghuṇā samīritaṃ vaco niśamyādhipatirdivaukasām /
GK19ragh1-6u:434: nivartayāmāsa rathaṃ savismayaḥ pracakrame ca prativaktumuttaram // Ragh(K)_3.47 //
GK19ragh1-6u:435: yathāttha rājanyakumāra tattathā yaśastu rakṣyaṃ parito yaśodhanaiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:437: hariryathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛto maheśvarastryambaka eva nāparaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:438: tathā vidurmāṃ munayaḥ śatakratuṃ dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ // Ragh(K)_3.49 //
GK19ragh1-6u:440: alaṃ prayatnena tavātra mā nidhāḥ padaṃ padavyāṃ sagarasya santateḥ // Ragh(K)_3.50 //
GK19ragh1-6u:442: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalvanirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān // Ragh(K)_3.51 //
GK19ragh1-6u:443: sa evamuktvā maghavantamunmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ saśaraṃ śarāsanam /
GK19ragh1-6u:450: bhuje śacīpattraviśeṣakāṅkite svanāmacihnaṃ nicakhāna sāyakam // Ragh(K)_3.55 //
GK19ragh1-6u:451: jahāra cānyena mayūralāñchanaṃ śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
GK19ragh1-6u:452: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahya keśavyaparopaṇādiva // Ragh(K)_3.56 //
GK19ragh1-6u:454: babhūva yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ jayaiṣiṇoradhomukhairūrdhvamukhaiśca pattribhiḥ // Ragh(K)_3.57 //
GK19ragh1-6u:456: śaśāka nirvāpayituṃ na vāsavaḥ svataścyutaṃ vahnimivādbhirambudaḥ // Ragh(K)_3.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:459: sa cāpamutsṛjya vivṛddhamatsaraḥ pravāsanāya prabalasya vidviṣaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:461: raghurbhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāsrubhiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:462: nimeṣamātrādavadhūya ca vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣaniḥsvanaiḥ // Ragh(K)_3.61 //
GK19ragh1-6u:464: tutoṣa vīryātiśayena vṛtrahā padaṃ hi sarvatra guṇairvidhīyate // Ragh(K)_3.62 //
GK19ragh1-6u:465: asaṅgamadriṣvapi sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍhamāyudham /
GK19ragh1-6u:466: avaihi māṃ prītamṛte turaṅgamādvaraṃ vṛṇīṣveti tamāha vṛtrahā // Ragh(K)_3.63 //
GK19ragh1-6u:468: dilīpasūnuḥ pratisaṃharanniṣuṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ pratyavadatsureśvaram // Ragh(K)_3.64 //
GK19ragh1-6u:469: amocyamaśvaṃ yadi manyate prabhustataḥ samāpte vidhineva karmaṇi /
GK19ragh1-6u:470: ajasradīkṣātanuradya me guruḥ kratoraśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām // Ragh(K)_3.65 //
GK19ragh1-6u:472: tavaiva sandeśaharādviśāṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti nākeśa tathā vidhīyatām // Ragh(K)_3.66 //
GK19ragh1-6u:474: nṛpasya nātipramanāḥ sadogṛhaṃ sudakṣiṇāsūnurapi nyavartata // Ragh(K)_3.67 //
GK19ragh1-6u:477: iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:479: atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam /
GK19ragh1-6u:480: munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam // Ragh(K)_3.70 //
GK19ragh1-6u:482: sa rājyaṃ guruṇā dattaṃ pratipadyādhikaṃ babhau /
GK19ragh1-6u:483: dinānte nihitaṃ tejaḥ savitreva hutāśanaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.1 //
GK19ragh1-6u:484: nyastaśastraṃ dilīpaṃ ca taṃ ca śuśruvuṣāṃ prabhum /
GK19ragh1-6u:496: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yuktadaṇḍatayā manaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:505: phalena sahakārasya puṣpodgama iva prajāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:511: vardhiṣṇavo diśāṃ bhāgāḥ pratāpāyeva recitāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.15 //
GK19ragh1-6u:513: svaṃ dhanuḥ śaṅkiteneva saṃjahre śatamanyunā // Ragh(K)_4.16 //
GK19ragh1-6u:515: ṛturviḍambayāmāsa na punaḥ prāpa tacchriyam // Ragh(K)_4.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:529: yātrāyai codayāmāsa taṃ śakteḥ prathamaṃ śarat // Ragh(K)_4.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:536: sa yayau prathamaṃ prācīṃ tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā /
GK19ragh1-6u:541: yayau paścādgajānīkaṃ catuḥskandheva sā camūḥ // Ragh(K)_4.30 //
GK19ragh1-6u:560: sa pratāpaṃ mahendrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇaṃ nyaveśayat /
GK19ragh1-6u:569: nārikelāsavaṃ yodhāḥ śātravaṃ ca yaśaḥ papuḥ // Ragh(K)_4.44 //
GK19ragh1-6u:571: hriyaṃ mahendranāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm // Ragh(K)_4.45 //
GK19ragh1-6u:581: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma kīṭakośābilaṃ rajaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.50 //
GK19ragh1-6u:585: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire // Ragh(K)_4.52 //
GK19ragh1-6u:587: te nipatya dadustasmai yaśaḥ svamiva sañcitam // Ragh(K)_4.53 //
GK19ragh1-6u:599: kaṭeṣu kariṇāṃ petuḥ punnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.59 //
GK19ragh1-6u:645: rājñā himavataḥ sāro rājñaḥ sāro himādriṇā // Ragh(K)_4.82 //
GK19ragh1-6u:659: ādānaṃ hi visargāya satāṃ vārimucāmiva // Ragh(K)_4.89 //
GK19ragh1-6u:666: upāttavidyo gurudakṣiṇārthī kautsaḥ prapede varatantuśiṣyaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.1 //
GK19ragh1-6u:673: kāyena vācā manasā ca taptaṃ yadvajriṇo dhairyaviparyayāya /
GK19ragh1-6u:674: āpādyate na vyayamantarāyaiḥ kaccinmaharṣestrividhaṃ tapastat // Ragh(K)_5.5 //
GK19ragh1-6u:683: api prasannena maharṣiṇā tvaṃ samyagvinīyānumato gṛhāya /
GK19ragh1-6u:684: kālo hyayaṃ saṅkramituṃ dvitīyaṃ sarvopakārakṣamamāśramaṃ te // Ragh(K)_5.10 //
GK19ragh1-6u:685: tavārhato nābhigamena tṛptaṃ mano niyogakriyayotsukaṃ me /
GK19ragh1-6u:686: apyājñayā śāsiturātmanā vā prāpto 'si sambhāvayituṃ vanānmām // Ragh(K)_5.11 //
GK19ragh1-6u:688: svārthopapattiṃ prati durbalāśaḥ pratyāha kautsastamapetakutsam // Ragh(K)_5.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:689: sarvatra no vārttamavaihi rājannāthe kutastvayyaśubhaṃ prajānām /
GK19ragh1-6u:690: sūrye tapatyāvaraṇāya dṛṣṭeḥ kalpeta lokasya kathaṃ tamisrā // Ragh(K)_5.13 //
GK19ragh1-6u:695: sthāne bhavānekanarādhipaḥ san akiñcanatvaṃ makhajaṃ vyanakti /
GK19ragh1-6u:696: paryāyapītasya surairhimāṃśoḥ kalākṣayaḥ ślāghyataro hi vṛddheḥ // Ragh(K)_5.16 //
GK19ragh1-6u:698: svastyastu te nirgalitāmbugarbhaṃ śaradghanaṃ nārdati cātako 'pi // Ragh(K)_5.17 //
GK19ragh1-6u:700: kiṃ vastu vidvangurave pradeyaṃ tvayā kiyadveti tamanvayuṅkta // Ragh(K)_5.18 //
GK19ragh1-6u:702: varṇāśramāṇāṃ gurave sa varṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ prastutamācacakṣe // Ragh(K)_5.19 //
GK19ragh1-6u:704: sa me cirādaskhalitopacārāṃ tāṃ bhaktimevāgaṇayatpurastāt // Ragh(K)_5.20 //
GK19ragh1-6u:706: vittasya vidyāparisaṅkhyayā me koṭīścatasro daśa cāhareti // Ragh(K)_5.21 //
GK19ragh1-6u:712: gato vadanyāntaramityayaṃ me mā bhūtparīvādanavāvatāraḥ // Ragh(K)_5.24 //
GK19ragh1-6u:713: sa tvaṃ prayaste mahito madīye vasaṃścaturtho 'gnirivāgnyagāre /
GK19ragh1-6u:716: gāmāttasārāṃ raghurapyavekṣya niṣkraṣṭumarthaṃ cakame kuverāt // Ragh(K)_5.26 //
GK19ragh1-6u:718: marutsakhasyeva balāhakasya gatirvijaghne na hi tadrathasya // Ragh(K)_5.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:719: athādhiśiśye prayataḥ pradoṣe rathaṃ raghuḥ kalpitamastragarbham /
GK19ragh1-6u:720: sāmantasambhāvanayaiva dhīraḥ kailāsanāthaṃ tarasā jigīṣuḥ // Ragh(K)_5.28 //
GK19ragh1-6u:722: hiraṇmayīṃ kośagṛhasya madhye vṛṣṭiṃ śaśaṃsuḥ patitāṃ nabhastaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:724: dideśa kautsāya samagrameva pādaṃ sumeroriva vajrabhinnam // Ragh(K)_5.30 //
GK19ragh1-6u:730: acintanīyastava tu prabhāvo manīṣitaṃ dyaurapi yena dugdhā // Ragh(K)_5.33 //
GK19ragh1-6u:732: putraṃ labhasvātmaguṇānurūpaṃ bhavantamīḍyo bhavataḥ piteva // Ragh(K)_5.34 //
GK19ragh1-6u:733: itthaṃ prayujyāśiṣamagryajanmā rājñe pratīyāya guroḥ sakāśam /
GK19ragh1-6u:734: rājāpi lebhe sutamāśu tasmād ālokamarkādiva jīvalokaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.35 //
GK19ragh1-6u:735: brāhme muhūrte kila tasya devī kumārakalpaṃ suṣuve kumāram /
GK19ragh1-6u:736: ataḥ pitā brahmaṇa eva nāmnā tamagryajanmānamajaṃ cakāra // Ragh(K)_5.36 //
GK19ragh1-6u:737: rūpaṃ tadojasvi tadeva vīryaṃ tadeva naisargikamunnatatvam /
GK19ragh1-6u:738: na kāraṇātsvādbibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa iva pradīpāt // Ragh(K)_5.37 //
GK19ragh1-6u:740: śrīḥ kāmayānāpi guroranujñāṃ dhīreva kanyā piturācakāṅkṣa // Ragh(K)_5.38 //
GK19ragh1-6u:742: āptaḥ kumārānayanotsukena bhojena dūto raghave visṛṣṭaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:743: taṃ ślāghyasambandhamasau vicintya dārakriyāyogyadaśaṃ ca putram /
GK19ragh1-6u:754: babhau sa bhindansahasā taraṅgānvāryargalābhaṅga iva pravṛttaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.45 //
GK19ragh1-6u:770: avaihi gandharvapatestanūjaṃ priyaṃvadaṃ māṃ priyadarśanasya // Ragh(K)_5.53 //
GK19ragh1-6u:774: saṃyokṣyase svena punarmahimnā tadetyavocatsa taponidhirmām // Ragh(K)_5.55 //
GK19ragh1-6u:775: sa mocitaḥ śāpakalestvayāhaṃ gatiṃ prapanno vihitāṃ vidhātrā /
GK19ragh1-6u:776: pratikriyāṃ cedbhavato na kuryāṃ vyarthā hi me syātsvapadopalabdhiḥ // Ragh(K)_5.56 //
GK19ragh1-6u:778: prasvāpanaṃ nāma yataḥ praharturna cārihiṃsā vijayaśca haste // Ragh(K)_5.57 //
GK19ragh1-6u:779: alaṃ hriyā māṃ prati yanmuhūrtaṃ dayāparo 'bhūḥ praharannapi tvam /
GK19ragh1-6u:780: tasmādupacchandayati prayojyaṃ mayi tvayā na pratiṣedharaukṣyam // Ragh(K)_5.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:781: tathetyupaspṛśya payaḥ pavitraṃ somodbhavāyāḥ sarito nṛsomaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:788: mene yathā tatra janaḥ sameto vaidarbhamāgantumajaṃ gṛheśam // Ragh(K)_5.62 //
GK19ragh1-6u:790: ramyāṃ raghupratinidhiḥ sa navopakāryāṃ bālyātparāmiva daśāṃ madano 'dhitasthau // Ragh(K)_5.63 //
GK19ragh1-6u:792: bhāvāvabodhakaluṣā dayiteva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayanābhimukhī babhūva // Ragh(K)_5.64 //
GK19ragh1-6u:795: rātrirgatā matimatāṃ vara muñca śayyāṃ dhātrā dvidhaiva jagato nanu dhūrvibhaktā /
GK19ragh1-6u:797: nidrāvaśena bhavatā hyanavekṣyamāṇā paryutsukatvamabalā niśi khaṇḍiteva /
GK19ragh1-6u:798: lakṣmīrvinodayati yena digantalambī so 'pi tvadānanarucaṃ vijahāti candraḥ // Ragh(K)_5.67 //
GK19ragh1-6u:799: tadvalgunā yugapadunmiṣitena tāvat sadyaḥ parasparatulāmadhirohatāṃ dve /
GK19ragh1-6u:802: svābhāvikaṃ paraguṇena vibhātavātaḥ saugandhyamīpsuriva te mukhamārutasya // Ragh(K)_5.69 //
GK19ragh1-6u:804: saṃlakṣyate daśanacandrikayānuviddhaṃ bimboṣṭhalabdhaparabhāgamiva smitaṃ te // Ragh(K)_5.70 //
GK19ragh1-6u:805: yāvatpratāpanidhirākramate na bhānurahnāya tāvadaruṇena tamo nirastam /
GK19ragh1-6u:806: āyodhanāgrasaratāṃ tvayi vīra yāte kiṃ vā ripūṃstava guruḥ svayamucchinatti // Ragh(K)_5.71 //
GK19ragh1-6u:808: yeṣāṃ vibhānti taruṇāruṇarāgayogādbhinnādrigairikataṭā iva dantakośāḥ // Ragh(K)_5.72 //
GK19ragh1-6u:809: dīrgheṣvamī niyamitāḥ paṭamaṇḍapeṣu nidrāṃ vidhūya vanajākṣa vanāyujāste /
GK19ragh1-6u:810: vaktroṣmaṇā malinayanti purogatāni lehyāni saindhavaśilāśakalāni vāhāḥ // Ragh(K)_5.73 //
GK19ragh1-6u:812: ayamapi ca giraṃ nastvatprabodhaprayuktāmanuvadati śukaste mañjuvākpañjarasthaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.74 //
GK19ragh1-6u:813: iti sa vihṛtanidrastalpamalpetarāṃsaḥ suragaja iva gāṅgaṃ saikataṃ supratīkaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:827: sahasradhātmā vyarucadvibhaktaḥ payomucāṃ paṅktiṣu vidyuteva // Ragh(K)_6.5 //
GK19ragh1-6u:829: rarāja dhāmnā raghusūnureva kalpadrumāṇāmiva pārijātaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.6 //
GK19ragh1-6u:831: madotkaṭe recitapuṣpavṛkṣā gandhadvipe vanya iva dvirephāḥ // Ragh(K)_6.7 //
GK19ragh1-6u:835: pradhmātaśaṅkhe parito digantāṃstūryasvane mūrchati maṅgalārthe // Ragh(K)_6.9 //
GK19ragh1-6u:841: pravātaśobhā iva pādapānāṃ śṛṅgāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ // Ragh(K)_6.12 //
GK19ragh1-6u:847: ratnāṃśusampṛktanakhaprabheṇa pādena haimaṃ vililekha pīṭham // Ragh(K)_6.15 //
GK19ragh1-6u:859: rājā prajārañjanalabdhavarṇaḥ parantapo nāma yathārthanāmā // Ragh(K)_6.21 //
GK19ragh1-6u:860: kāmaṃ nṛpāḥ santi sahasrasaṅkhyā rājanvatīmāhuranena pṛthvīm /
GK19ragh1-6u:864: anena cedicchasi gṛhyamāṇaṃ pāṇiṃ vareṇyena kuru praveśe /
GK19ragh1-6u:868: tāṃ sātha vetragrahaṇe niyuktā rājāntaraṃ rājasutāṃ nināya /
GK19ragh1-6u:871: vinītabhāgaḥ kila sūtrakārairaindraṃ padaṃ bhūmigato 'pi bhuṅkte // Ragh(K)_6.27 //
GK19ragh1-6u:875: kāntyā girā sūnṛtayā ca yogyā tvameva kalyāṇi tayostṛtīyā // Ragh(K)_6.29 //
GK19ragh1-6u:877: nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag draṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucirhi lokaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.30 //
GK19ragh1-6u:878: tataḥ paraṃ duṣprasahaṃ pareṣāṃ nṛpaṃ niyuktā pratihārabhūmau /
GK19ragh1-6u:885: divāpi jālāntaracandrikāṇāṃ nārīsakhaḥ sparśasukhāni bhuṅkte // Ragh(K)_6.34 //
GK19ragh1-6u:886: anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccinmanaso ruciste /
GK19ragh1-6u:889: babandha sā nottamasaukumāryā kumudvatī bhānumatīva bhāvam // Ragh(K)_6.36 //
GK19ragh1-6u:891: vidhāya sṛṣṭiṃ lalitāṃ vidhātur jagāda bhūyaḥ sunasāṃ sunandā // Ragh(K)_6.37 //
GK19ragh1-6u:893: ananyasādhāraṇarājaśabdo babhūva yogī kila kārtavīryaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.38 //
GK19ragh1-6u:895: antaḥśarīreṣvapi yaḥ prajānāṃ pratyādideśāvinayaṃ vinetā // Ragh(K)_6.39 //
GK19ragh1-6u:899: yena śriyaḥ saṃśrayadoṣarūḍhaṃ svabhāvaloletyayaśaḥ pramṛṣṭam // Ragh(K)_6.41 //
GK19ragh1-6u:903: prāsādajālairjalaveṇiramyāṃ revāṃ yadi prekṣitumasti kāmaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.43 //
GK19ragh1-6u:904: tasyāḥ prakāmapriyadarśano 'pi na sa kṣitīśo rucaye babhūva /
GK19ragh1-6u:908: nīpānvayaḥ pārthiva eṣa yajvā guṇairyamāśritya paraspareṇa /
GK19ragh1-6u:909: naisargiko 'pyutsasṛje virodhaḥ siddhāśramaṃ śāntamivaitya sattvaiḥ // Ragh(K)_6.46 //
GK19ragh1-6u:914: trātena tārkṣyātkila kāliyena maṇiṃ visṛṣṭaṃ yamunaukasā yaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:915: vakṣaḥsthalavyāpirucaṃ dadhānaḥ sakaustubhaṃ hrepayatīva kṛṣṇam // Ragh(K)_6.49 //
GK19ragh1-6u:917: vṛndāvane caitrarathādanūne nirviśyatāṃ sundari yauvanaśrīḥ // Ragh(K)_6.50 //
GK19ragh1-6u:919: kalāpināṃ prāvṛṣi paśya nṛttaṃ kāntāsu govardhanakandarāsu // Ragh(K)_6.51 //
GK19ragh1-6u:925: yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ // Ragh(K)_6.54 //
GK19ragh1-6u:926: jyāghātalekhe subhujo bhujābhyāṃ bibharti yaścāpabhṛtāṃ purogaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:927: ripuśriyaḥ sāñjanavāṣpaseke vandīkṛtāyā iva paddhatī dve // Ragh(K)_6.55 //
GK19ragh1-6u:933: tasmādapāvartata pauruṣeṇa nīteva lakṣmīḥ pratikūladaivāt // Ragh(K)_6.58 //
GK19ragh1-6u:935: itaścakorākṣi vilokayeti nāgāṅganābhāṃ nijagāda bhojyām // Ragh(K)_6.59 //
GK19ragh1-6u:941: purā janasthānavimardaśaṅkī sandhāya laṅkādhipatiḥ pratasthe // Ragh(K)_6.62 //
GK19ragh1-6u:942: anena pāṇau vidhivadgṛhīte mahākulīnena mahīva gurvī /
GK19ragh1-6u:943: ratnānuviddhārṇavamekhalāyā diśaḥ sapatnī bhava dakṣiṇasyāḥ // Ragh(K)_6.63 //
GK19ragh1-6u:950: sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā /
GK19ragh1-6u:951: narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ // Ragh(K)_6.67 //
GK19ragh1-6u:952: tasyāṃ raghoḥ sūnurupasthitāyāṃ vṛṇīta māṃ neti samākulo 'bhūt /
GK19ragh1-6u:955: na hi praphultaṃ sahakārametya vṛkṣāntaraṃ kāṅkṣati ṣaṭpadālī // Ragh(K)_6.69 //
GK19ragh1-6u:957: pracakrame vaktumanukramajñā suvistaraṃ vākyamidaṃ sunandā // Ragh(K)_6.70 //
GK19ragh1-6u:959: kākutsthaśabdaṃ yata unnatecchāḥ ślāghyaṃ dadhatyuttarakosalendrāḥ // Ragh(K)_6.71 //
GK19ragh1-6u:964: jātaḥ kule tasya kilendukīrteḥ kulapradīpo nṛpatirdilīpaḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:966: yasminmahīṃ śāsati māninīnāṃ nidrāṃ vihārārdhapathe gatānām /
GK19ragh1-6u:967: vāto 'pi nāsraṃsayadaṃśukāni ko lambayedābharaṇāya hastam // Ragh(K)_6.75 //
GK19ragh1-6u:968: putro raghustasya padaṃ praśāsti mahākratorviśvajitaḥ prayoktā /
GK19ragh1-6u:971: ūrdhvaṃ gataṃ yasya na cānubandhi yaśaḥ paricchettumiyattayālam // Ragh(K)_6.77 //
GK19ragh1-6u:973: gurvīṃ dhuraṃ yo bhuvanasya pitryāṃ dhuryeṇa damyaḥ sadṛśīṃ bibharti // Ragh(K)_6.78 //
GK19ragh1-6u:974: kulena kāntyā vayasā navena guṇaiśca taistairvinayapradhānaiḥ /
GK19ragh1-6u:975: tvamātmanastulyamimaṃ vṛṇīṣva ratnaṃ samāgacchatu kāñcanena // Ragh(K)_6.79 //
GK19ragh1-6u:978: sā yūni tasminnabhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vaktum /
GK19ragh1-6u:979: romāñcalakṣyeṇa sa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākrāmadarālakeśyāḥ // Ragh(K)_6.81 //
GK19ragh1-6u:980: tathāgatāyāṃ parihāsapūrvaṃ sakhyāṃ sakhī vetradharā babhāṣe /
GK19ragh1-6u:981: ārye vrajāmo 'nyata ityathaināṃ vadhūrasūyākuṭilaṃ dadarśa // Ragh(K)_6.82 //
GK19ragh1-6u:983: āsañjayāmāsa yathāpradeśaṃ kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ mūrtamivānurāgam // Ragh(K)_6.83 //
GK19ragh1-6u:987: iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vivavruḥ // Ragh(K)_6.85 //
GK19ragh1-6u:989: uṣasi sara iva praphultapadmaṃ kumudavanapratipannanidramāsīt // Ragh(K)_6.86 //
